title: When coyote parents get used to humans, their offspring become bolder, too

title_detail.value: When coyote parents get used to humans, their offspring become bolder, too

summary: When coyote parents are habituated to humans, their offspring are more habituated, too -- potentially leading to negative interactions between coyotes and humans.

summary_detail.value: When coyote parents are habituated to humans, their offspring are more habituated, too -- potentially leading to negative interactions between coyotes and humans.
